article: facing a court ruling that may declare it a racist group , the flemish bloc political party plans to disband and reform under a new name with a manifesto that abandons the fascist tenor that got the most popular political party in dutch-speaking belgium into legal trouble .
abstract: facing ban far-right belgian party to re-emerge as kinder more mainstream force
